quote: I have the simplest tastes. I am always satisfied with the best.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: The reward of suffering is experience.
author: Harry S Truman

quote: You have to make it happen.
author: Denis Diderot

quote: When one must, one can.
author: Charlotte Whitton

quote: If I had to live my life again, I'd make the same mistakes, only sooner.
author: Tallulah Bankhead

quote: It is not length of life, but depth of life.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The best way to cheer yourself up is to try to cheer somebody else up.
author: Mark Twain

quote: It is certain, in any case, that ignorance, allied with power, is the most ferocious enemy justice can have.
author: James A. Baldwin

quote: Blessed are the hearts that can bend; they shall never be broken.
author: Albert Camus

quote: It has been my experience that folks who have no vices have very few virtues.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Men make history and not the other way around. In periods where there is no leadership, society stands still. Progress occurs when courageous, skillful leaders seize the opportunity to change things for the better.
author: Harry S Truman

quote: When you have a dream, you've got to grab it and never let go.
author: Carol Burnett

quote: To be a Negro in this country and to be relatively conscious is to be in a rage almost all the time.
author: James A. Baldwin

quote: You will never win if you never begin.
author: Helen Rowland

quote: Love is when the other person's happiness is more important than your own.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: How people treat you is their karma; how you react is yours.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: I look to a day when people will not be judged by the color of their skin, but by the content of their character.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: Friends show their love in times of trouble, not in happiness.
author: Euripides

quote: There are no strangers here; Only friends you haven't yet met.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: The art of communication is the language of leadership.
author: James Humes

quote: Words, once they are printed, have a life of their own.
author: Carol Burnett

quote: We should not give up and we should not allow the problem to defeat us.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam
